issue.title: [CF 1224] 6 combo points not working on PTR
issue.body:
What steps will reproduce the problem?
1. Enable "Deeper Stratagem" talent on row 3 (45 bracket)
2. Try to create a conditional using Player Resources > Combo Points
3. Slider goes from 0 to 5. Needs to go up to 6 due to talent.

What do you expect to happen? What happens instead?
Allow me to use 6 CB.

What version of TellMeWhen are you using? ("The latest" is not a version)
7.4.0-103-g1f5302c

Do you have an error log of what happened?
No

Please provide any additional information below (including any export strings if applicable; see above.)

Using PTR.


> Posted by CurseForge user Artemyis | Imported from CurseForge issue #1224 | Raw

comments.body:
Thank you for the report!


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
